name: Sarvodaya Shikshan Sansthan
briefDescription: Vision:        "A society based on legitimate rights, equity, justice, honesty, social concern and a        	culture of service in which all are self-reliant and self esteems''Mission:	 	To co-ordinate the Venerable and Marginalized community became self-reliant and benefit from a healthy, dignified and sustainable quality of life Objective of the Organization:1.	Provide and link health & education facilities to women & children.                  2.	Conducting different professionals learning programs to promote self-employment.3.	To promote different development activities for upliftments of poor, backward and vulnerable group of society.4.	To develop those CBOs on the basic of public cooperation that may become the social change agent.5.	To organize different awareness programs to create social consciousness on social issues.6.	To renovate the moral & educational environment of poor children.7.	Fights against Child rights & Mahajani Pratha( Village money lending System)8.	To create Livelihood opportunity for Tribal's9.	To create Awareness for  Climate Change		Strategy and Methodology:•	Managements of informal education •	Organize activities like health campaign & employment oriented trainings for: rural development.•	Arrange different opportunities for Handicapped children’s•	 Conduct different activities for socials and cultural integration of society.•	Representation of all section of the community level decision- making   processes across caste, class and societal barriers. Making available the same minimum level service and decision-making space for all, creates a level playing fields.•	Equal representation and participation of men & women in community level decision –making and control. Women partake alongside men I articulating concerns, taking responsibility and actively participating in development processes.
